code:
export const playerRanks=[// Beginner Ranks (Levels 1-5) - Much more challenging progression
{level:1,name:'PIXEL NOVICE',minXP:0,color:'#9CA3AF',icon:'🌱',description:'Just getting started'},{level:2,name:'DATA SEEKER',minXP:100,color:'#9CA3AF',icon:'🔍',description:'Learning the ropes'},{level:3,name:'LOG KEEPER',minXP:300,color:'#10B981',icon:'📝',description:'Building good habits'},{level:4,name:'BYTE WARRIOR',minXP:600,color:'#10B981',icon:'⚔️',description:'Finding your rhythm'},{level:5,name:'CODE SCOUT',minXP:1000,color:'#10B981',icon:'🎯',description:'Consistent progress'},// Intermediate Ranks (Levels 6-10) - Significant commitment required
{level:6,name:'DIGITAL RANGER',minXP:1500,color:'#3B82F6',icon:'🏹',description:'Steady advancement'},{level:7,name:'CYBER GUARDIAN',minXP:2200,color:'#3B82F6',icon:'🛡️',description:'Reliable performer'},{level:8,name:'MATRIX EXPLORER',minXP:3000,color:'#3B82F6',icon:'🗺️',description:'Expanding horizons'},{level:9,name:'PIXEL KNIGHT',minXP:4000,color:'#8B5CF6',icon:'🗡️',description:'Proven dedication'},{level:10,name:'DATA CHAMPION',minXP:5200,color:'#8B5CF6',icon:'🏆',description:'Excellence achieved'},// Advanced Ranks (Levels 11-15) - Serious dedication
{level:11,name:'BYTE COMMANDER',minXP:6600,color:'#8B5CF6',icon:'⭐',description:'Leading by example'},{level:12,name:'LOGIC OVERLORD',minXP:8200,color:'#8B5CF6',icon:'🔮',description:'Mastering complexity'},{level:13,name:'SYSTEM ARCHITECT',minXP:10000,color:'#F59E0B',icon:'🏗️',description:'Building greatness'},{level:14,name:'NEURAL HACKER',minXP:12000,color:'#F59E0B',icon:'🧠',description:'Exceptional insight'},{level:15,name:'QUANTUM ANALYST',minXP:14500,color:'#F59E0B',icon:'⚛️',description:'Transcending limits'},// Elite Ranks (Levels 16-20) - Elite commitment
{level:16,name:'CYBER SAGE',minXP:17500,color:'#06b6d4',icon:'🔯',description:'Wisdom incarnate'},{level:17,name:'MATRIX MASTER',minXP:21000,color:'#06b6d4',icon:'👑',description:'Legendary status'},{level:18,name:'DIGITAL EMPEROR',minXP:25000,color:'#06b6d4',icon:'🏛️',description:'Ruling the realm'},{level:19,name:'DATA DEITY',minXP:30000,color:'#06b6d4',icon:'⚡',description:'Divine mastery'},{level:20,name:'PIXEL OMNARCH',minXP:40000,color:'#06b6d4',icon:'♦️',description:'Ultimate achievement'}];export const getRankByXP=totalXP=>{return[...playerRanks].reverse().find(rank=>totalXP>=rank.minXP)||playerRanks[0];};export const getNextRank=currentLevel=>{return playerRanks.find(rank=>rank.level>currentLevel);};export const getRankByLevel=level=>{return playerRanks.find(rank=>rank.level===level)||playerRanks[0];};
